Description:
Assist team members with project objectives, budgets, and timelines.
Guide and communicate with the in-house team to achieve project objectives in the desired timeframe.
Work with colleagues to ensure smooth progress and execution of architectural projects.
Help new and existing teammates by explaining a specific project's timelines and other technical aspects.
 Collaborate with clients to understand their design preferences and requirements, translating them into unique and practical design solutions.
Lead a team of junior designers, delegating tasks and overseeing project timelines to ensure timely and successful project delivery.
Develop detailed design concepts, including floor plans, color schemes, material selections, and furniture layouts.
 Present design proposals to clients through visual presentations, 3D renderings, and mood boards, effectively communicating design concepts.
Successfully completed multiple commercial and residential projects, receiving positive feedback from clients and stakeholders.
Site Supervision, Coordinate with supplier. Skills
Skills:
Good time management skills.
Minimum graduate degree holder in the Architecture stream from a reputed institute.
Professional license to practice Architectural design and project work.
Expertise in recent Architectural techniques and standards for effective implementation in the company projects.
Minimum work experience is 5 years.

Preferred.Residence Location: Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates ; Dubai, United Arab Emirates
